website_summaries.verdict: This heating pad has a simple design that makes a big difference for those suffering from neck, back, or shoulder pain.
pros: This heating pad is an impressive length, allowing users to position it comfortably around the neck
Warm, moist heat is very effective in relieving tension and stress and lessening neck, shoulder, and back pain
Is made of quality material and doesn’t have a scent
cons: Some users may find it to be slightly heavy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Well Made Neck Wrap
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely well made and works exactly like advertised. I have tried dozens of neck wraps and heating pads over the years and the Sunny Bay wrap is one of the best I have tried. The exterior material is high quality, soft, and durable. They didn't scrimp on the beads, so you don't have to keep repositioning the beads to keep the heat where you want it. Overall, I'm very Impressed and will be purchasing other Sunny Bay products in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Vandenbush

customer_reviews.title: Very good neck pain relief
customer_reviews.text: After I had had neck pain for days, this easy-to-use product gave me almost instant relief. Its soothing heat also improved my ability to move my head from side-to-side without pain. Sometimes I fall asleep when sitting in a chair; and with this wrap around my neck when that happens, it provides the added benefit of stabilizing my neck, keeping my head from falling into an unnatural position and adding new neck pain. I would definitely recommend this neck wrap.
customer_reviews.author: geek0130

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: After suffering a back injury, I needed something to sooth my pain. This wonderful heating wrap did the trick. After heating it up in the microwave, I ly on my side and drap the wrap over my side with the majority hanging down over my injured back area. The heat is soothing and pain releasing. The wrap holds and dispenses heat for a remarkable length of time. It is carefully constructed with a nice velvety cloth covering, Most highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: builder

customer_reviews.title: A life saver post whiplash
customer_reviews.text: I heat it for 2.5 minutes and it stays warm for up to 30 minutes without being to hot. I like that I can wrap it once around my neck and then drape it over the top of my injured shoulder. Great for post auto injury whiplash + shoulder injury. I am only 5 feet five inches with a small frame. It would definitely wrap around and support the neck of a larger person.
customer_reviews.author: College Parent

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've warmed up to this product. Initially the smell bothered me, very plastic...maybe the fleece? It fades. I also didn't love the stiffness but found the weight of it is worth the stiffness. It holds its heat well and the length makes it easy to use along the spine, over the pecs etc. I use it every day now :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly L.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much that I ordered one for myself
customer_reviews.text: I bought once for my son. I liked it so much that I ordered one for myself. I know that it's designed for the next use. But I suffer from back fractures and a broken hip. I warm it up and line the chair with it. I place it on the small of my back and curl it around my hip. Works beautiful. Good quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: PORTER

customer_reviews.title: A caring company with a GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the SunnyBoy neck heating wrap because it is important to me that #1it was made in America . I'm impressed with the quality of the material, stitching, and the length of it. They even sent an email to make sure I understood how to use the wrap. Everything just shouts this company cares about their product but more so cares about the customer. You would not be sorry you purchased anything this company makes
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Maynard

customer_reviews.title: pain chaser
customer_reviews.text: Some how I strained the muscles in my neck, tough job since I'm nearly bed ridden, pain, a great deal of the time. Allergic to pain medication, wakes me out of a dead sleep at times, I'm still alive. Heating pad not flexible to wrap a round neck. This tube is perfect, heated up to two and a half minutes, laid on side and back of neck, cut the tension in my neck. I've been massaged, electrical charged, bio freeze, icee hot, you name it, nothing worked. Tonight the heated wheat filled tubes did the job. THANK YOU. First time in six days, I have relief. Will try it on my other damaged joints tomorrow. I'm glad we kept trying.
customer_reviews.author: old shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wrap it up!
customer_reviews.text: It does its job ! Can’t complain. Heats up well in the microwave and cools in freezer .
customer_reviews.author: Bang1

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Received my neck heating wrap and I have to say good quality and warms up real nice just follow the instructions on heating included in your order and your good to go!....I used it immediately and found it to be a moist heat which is what I wanted. As far as the scent there really isn't any I added some lavender essential oil to it when I heated it and it was soothing. It was definitely a good choice in my opinion to order from this seller... will recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Enchanted1

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore neck muscles
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night to relax my neck muscles. Some of the reviews mentioned a strange smell but I haven’t experienced that. I put it on the microwave turntable for 2 minutes and it’s good for about 30 minutes. I’m careful to make sure it’s not folded in on itself in the microwave and have had no issues with burning etc. It’s soft material and is a good length to completely wrap your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I cheated the first time I tried it.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, works very well. It loves me... or at least I like to think it does. A couple minutes in the microwave and around my neck it goes. I have this at work, and another at home. Love them. My wife said that I like it too much... that is when I told her I was in love again... No wonder my neck hurts now.
customer_reviews.author: Britney W.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable, but poor heat retention
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is very soft and comfortable. But the grains inside are very small and therefore they don’t retain heat for very long. The wrap also gives off a mild industrial-like odor when heated. It’s not real offensive, but not very pleasant either. Bottom line, I would not but this again.
customer_reviews.author: GaryH

customer_reviews.title: Love , Love, Love  it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have cervical neck DDD and I do daily stretching exercises and this is the perfect neck warmer to use prior to my stretches . I have another neck warmer I purchased from my physical therapy place but this one is 100 x’s better . Love it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Gentle warmth
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Has a very gentle warmth that only a handmade item can give. Thanks! Can’t wait for the second one to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Gambro

customer_reviews.title: Relief from neck and shoulder pain....
customer_reviews.text: I had a car accident 2 years ago and cracked my collar bone so I thought this would help after reading the other reviews. I also have arthritis in that area. I just received the wrap yesterday and used it right away. I found 1 minute then turn over and then another 30 seconds in the microwave to be adequate. It felt nice. Not too hot. My neck and shoulder sweat a bit or perhaps that was moisture from the wrap? No worries. I'm going to keep it and use it quite a bit. I didn't, however, detect any aroma good or bad coming from it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Calderwood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s very helpful with a tight neck but unfortunately my friends neck wrap has holes in it the stuffing & it’s leaking. Reading the reviews has brought to my attention that melting (wholes) in the wrap can form after microwaving for ‘too long’ Instructions say two minutes, but some people have had problems even with them following the instructions; including problems like the wrap catching on fire 🔥 in their microwave, so use caution. It’s best to just stop microwave every 30 seconds and shake wrap to avoid overheating
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Bruhn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ordering my second one because I left my other in a different state when I moved. I absolutely love this because it holds heat for a long time and it's soft. Can't really rate a scent on this because it wasn't scented which is fine cause there's one's I've had that were scented that eventually ranged up smelling burned. This one doesn't end up like that. I give this product 2 very enthusiastic thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Emma byler

customer_reviews.title: Heated Neck Wrap
customer_reviews.text: I really like this neck wrap, however it's not as long as it appears in the photos when you take it out of the box. I've been using it for about a month and it seems to have stretched out a bit so it's longer that it was initially. It heats up well and retains heat nicely. The fabric covering is a nice soft fleece.
customer_reviews.author: L. Van Tol

customer_reviews.title: I think it will do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she likes it. Although one thing is that it doesn’t get warm after you put it in microwave for 1 min. They say do 10 seconds increments after until desired temperature reached. But I had to go almost 4 minutes to get it warm enough (not hot). Plus I thought this will smell like my other beanbag (Lavender smell). It didn’t there were no scent. There are glass beed inside. But I guess I shouldn’t be happy; my mom should be and she is. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from back-of-the-neck and shoulder muscle spasms due to a variety of reasons including computer use, posture, weak internal neck muscles and carrying heavy items constantly (I now use a roller bag). I do deep tissue massage therapy and my message therapist recommend a heat wrap to place over my neck after our sessions. This wrap is really easy to use and comfortable. The massage therapy is already helpful so I don't know that this would work for me on its own, but as a compliment to the therapy it's been good. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Soothing, relaxing heat in just minutes.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised. It's a simple heat/cold wrap filled with what I believe is flax seed. The first few uses, it gets damp, and that goes away after a while. It's great after a long day working hunched over at my workbench, a couple minutes in the microwave, it relaxes the knotted up muscles in my neck and along my collarbone. My wife loves it on a cool night after getting off work, it relaxes everything away.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for neck and shoulder pain. It's great so far.
customer_reviews.author: esm

customer_reviews.title: Wish I ordered this years ago
customer_reviews.text: My grandma used to make home made versions of these. I haven't used one in a while but found myself wishing I still had one she made. I did some research online and there were so many to choose from. Some of the reviews for some products made me worried with getting caught on fire in my microwave, hard pass. Others also talked about being scented and all that jazz. This product heats up within 3 minutes in my microwave with no fires or issues. There is some smell to it but after a few uses its hard to even notice. The smell is not overwhelming. Feels great and super convenient to have on hand
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Second one we have purchased - Much better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Long-time fan of heating pads. The first one was purchased by my wife- she liked the extra length and the twin strips. Very happy with it. I borrowed hers after some surgery and was great being able to wrap around back of neck as well as over each shoulder.. Soon had to get my own. Neither have scent. Have used it chilled and very effective .
customer_reviews.author: Kiwiruss

customer_reviews.title: The heating wrap feels great on your neck
customer_reviews.text: The heating wrap feels great on your neck, is sufficiently long, and will probably last a long time. But they advertise that it will somehow stay wrapped around your neck and this is not true. You will have to use a tie of some sort or a rubber band to keep it in position.
customer_reviews.author: Dee B.

customer_reviews.title: Long Neck Wrap
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is perfect for my 83 yr old mom who is always cold. She doesn't have pain and was instantly smiling with the comfort of the warmth the wrap brought to her entire upper body as she sits and reads the newspaper or relaxes in her chair. It's soft and not overstuffed and a manageable size for her to handle. I would highly recommend this product for it's intended uses as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Glass

customer_reviews.title: Bought for ice pack
customer_reviews.text: Put in freezer in plastic bag prior to use as instructed. Did not stay cold longer than 5 minutes. Returned item next day.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have some neck issues and this product is very helpful. I have only used it for heat. I like that it is microwavable and it is long enough and comfortable that you can wear it around the house. It stays warm for 15-20 minutes; longer would be nice but I guess it would start out too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty Fifties

customer_reviews.title: would not buy
customer_reviews.text: This neck wrap developed a hole I the seam on one corner and the grain started falling out. It was a mess. I returned it. I thought it was heavy. When you have a sore neck, being heavy doesn't feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Karldeen C. Pfafman

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck pain
customer_reviews.text: This neck warmer helped my neck pain last night. I have degenerate disc disease and kept this soft brace around my neck all night. I slept much better with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marysatt

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice any scent. The directions said to heat for a minute then 10 second increments until it was up to temp. It said it can burn so don’t heat too long. I’ve put it in three full consecutive minutes without it getting “hot” or burning. It works to warm but I wish it would get hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire in my microwave!
customer_reviews.text: This item caught on fire in my microwave! I don't know if this is because I put it in for too long (5 minutes) or because of the size/power of my microwave but the little beads inside definitely caught fire and burned a hole through the fabric. It smelled terrible when it happened, as you would expect. Just wanted to share to warn everyone so that no else has this issue and burns down their house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F

customer_reviews.title: Slow to warm but so cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap! The weight is great and so comfortable, and it feels very well made. It does seem to take significantly longer to heat than the instructions indicate but it is worth the patience and holds warmth well. I anticipate it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with neck pain and heat helps. This is an easy way to apply heat to the neck. But depending on your neck issue, this may be too heavy on your neck and create discomfort as it does me. It would be perfect if it wasn't so weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wrap for Neck Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from a fracture in my neck. Following my home therapy exercises and stretches, I put the heated wrap around my neck. It is very soothing. I heat it in my 700 power microwave for 2 minutes 40 seconds. The material is soft and comfortable, and the rice does not get too hot. The only negative that I have is that it will not stay wrapped around my neck without me holding it when I am sitting up. With that said, I would purchase another one if needed. This one serves my purpose better than any other wrap that I've had.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great but alittle Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds warmth nicely, it’s a great length to cover more of the area that needs aid, and doesn’t leave a gross smell when I warm it up. My only complaint is its a pretty heavy product to have draped around your neck for when my neck is aching. It’s nicer to lay down and drape it so it doesn’t weigh your shoulders down. I like it, just wish it was lighter is all.
customer_reviews.author: Devin M.

customer_reviews.title: The Sunny Bay heating pad works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually am using the heating pad to wrap around my Beta Fish bowl in the colder months when my house heat is not on. The heating pad stays hot for a very long time and keeps the warm air in the fish bowl! I love the fact it has a double layer...it is EXACTLY what I was looking for and works great!!! I am very very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a corded heating pad.
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with spinal stenosis and my physical therapist told me to warm up my back before starting my back exercises. This pad works perfectly. It retains the heat for quite a while and being microwavable I don't worry about a plug getting in the way. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KCofNJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple one as a gift for a friend with neck pain and she loves it. I also bought myself the blue patter one and it is awesome. It can be a little heavy around the neck and cause stiffness if left on for too long but I like to use it around my waist or across my lower stomach as well. Very comforting and great quality. Very durable. I microwave it for about 2 minutes, never more, sometimes less.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Use constantly
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this item. Have had it for years, still in great condition and I use it all the time. Shape and flexibility make it easy to use on any part of the body. Never gets too hot and holds heat for at least 30 minutes or more. I use it to warm the sheets in the winter and it basically lasts all night for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold heat sufficiently
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wrap thinking it was made of rice (this was my fault as I read it in one of the reviews). Flax seed takes a long time to get hot enough and does not hold the heat well at all. The product seems well made, it is just not sufficient for my needs. Also, make sure this is what you want, it cost me $6.00 to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: The construction is sturdy and the fabric feels strong
customer_reviews.text: The construction is sturdy and the fabric feels strong, but it seems like there's quite a lot of wasted space inside. The fabric seems to hold the heat in much better, resulting in a more mild wet heat that lasts longer than my other similar microwavable bags. In hindsight, I would have opted for the larger size advertised for the back.
customer_reviews.author: MW3

customer_reviews.title: Heats up, stays warm
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched nerve so I wanted a heating pad for those days it is really aching. First this one takes a while to warm up, so plan on checking it a few times, but once it was warm enough it did retain the heat for awhile. My difficulty was that it is pretty heavy which causes more pain and defeats the purpose. I would imagine some people would like that feature
customer_reviews.author: E Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice therapy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband & he loves it. Uses it practically every night before bed. It relieves tension in neck & shoulders. The only negative is the smell once the roll is heated. It’s a pungent, weird smell. Other than that, it’s worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy thick and not easily maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, thick and not easily maneuverable. When you’re in pain in your neck area and you can’t even make this thing move around to help you feel better and it doesn’t; it’s not worth the cost. I thought it was quite expensive and it had great reviews but to me they were misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Funneverends

customer_reviews.title: Sweet wrap!!
customer_reviews.text: My 85 year old mom has severe arthritis in her neck. This neck wrap when heated gives off long lasting moist heat that loosens the muscles and helps her move her head with far less pain. The cover is very soft and comforting. It's long enough to wrap around and hang down so as to easily stay in place. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Moratto

customer_reviews.title: Super conflicted
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this wrap. It's a bit more expensive than other, but really soft and stays warm. Problem is that it burned up in the microwave after 15-20 uses. I really want to love it and almost want to buy it again, but I am afraid I will have the same results.
customer_reviews.author: MrMystery

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis primarily in the back of my neck and shoulder from a car accident several years back. Both ached constantly with limited range of motion. I have tried regular heating pads, warm rice bags you name it and I tried it. When I saw this on Amazon and had to get it. I received this yesterday and immediately put it on and found relief! I would highly recommend this heating pad and will be using this daily!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift. And comforting for pain.
customer_reviews.text: This bear resemblance to the ultra expensive Burberry pattern, and it feels like soft cottony flannel on your skin. Wonderful natural fragrance. I would give these as gifts, as well as buy for my own pain management, because they're so pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: JC LeMay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape of this— I got it for rotator cuff tendinitis, but it is great on my neck just to relax or to warm up on a cold night. The quality is fine, I expect it will last a long time. The fabric may not feel hot right after microwaving it, but the inside will be. (I think you’d really have to overheat it to burn holes in it!)
customer_reviews.author: CLE

customer_reviews.title: the pad warms up pretty fast and good
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is very heavy for me, that’s why I am giving 3 stars only. I have damaged neck discs, the pad warms up pretty fast and good. I use it for a short period of time and laying down only, then it’s too bulky. However, It relieves my neck pain some whenever I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use because of STRONG pneumonia like smell
customer_reviews.text: I would love this if it wasn’t for the smell. It has a strong almost pneumonia smell and I just can’t use it or get past this because of this
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bag and cute too
customer_reviews.text: This is a great neck bean bag i heat for 240 or 3 minutes and its perfect i just wish it had velcro to hold it on but i use a scarf!!! Id def buy again
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say well it looked nice and felt soft it was just too heavy for me I have a purple neck ice by your company I believe but this just wasn’t the right one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: All of the above.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed because it doesn’t stay hot fir very long. Also, it’s supposed to be extra long but barely goes around my neck and I don’t have a large neck. There’s no Velcro to hold it together at the ends so I hav3 to keep hold of it for the few minutes it stays hit. Rey disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Edith English

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Sore Necks
customer_reviews.text: *Does not have a smell. And has right amount of warmth & moisture. *Tried the doctors recommendation of rice. Terribly smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length and soft material
customer_reviews.text: I received my neck wrap last night when I got home from work. I used it immediately and loved it. I did appreciate receiving the extra heating instructions via email this morning. It is not too long. It fits my neck perfectly. I like the dark color since it is spot clean only. This wrap is high quality design and material. I am going to purchase another one for my husband right now.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Piunti

customer_reviews.title: This one holds the heat for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this holds the heat for a LONG time! It’s super soft and easy to use. Thanks for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Silver

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have used mine several times since its arrival a few days ago. I've used it on my neck, as a knee wrap and, as a hand warmer. I got the XL Neck Wrap and must admit that I should have gone with a smaller size for my neck as the XL is a bit heavy for my neck size. But, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Keene

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just a couple minutes in the microwave and it stays warm for quite a while. Hugs your neck comfortably. Relatives borrowed it and loved it immediately. Buying another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received the item in a few days. Great quality, good length. First time you heat it up it has a strange smell. But the seller does send an email letting you know this will be the case the first few times you heat it up. Overall good product, and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jona

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a real good product and the heat comes in handy around the neck. We heat for about two minutes and it is just rite.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Putman

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST YOU CAN BUY...ITS LONG ENOUGH FOR YOUR NECK AND SHOULDERS HOLDS HEAT FOR A LONG TIME
customer_reviews.author: ranger

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Heat
customer_reviews.text: I like the Burberry flavor. Take a little more microwave time to get it warm. Careful. Soothing. Just about the right size. Who can complain?
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gansauer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly around neck and stays put
customer_reviews.text: The first day the scent wasn’t great after heated however it went away after first time. My husband and I have chronic neck and shoulder pain and this is the perfect size that fits right in and stays when placed. I use all day long and love it! I had my replaced my expensive aromatherapy heat pack with this one and was curious to see how it would work but clearly love it. Also the perfect length so not too big in the microwave to stop the table from turning.
customer_reviews.author: Meemg

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Large and soft as advertised. Good relief and comfort to neck and Shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Stubbs Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Pinched Nerve
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I just plopped it in the microwave and then on my neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica

customer_reviews.title: Small and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th or 7th. I have bought it to have it at different places. Even gifted some. Totally in love!
customer_reviews.author: Renata R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and as promised in product description
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and as promised in product description. After many months of use, however, the interior is slipping around and there are pockets of no filling.
customer_reviews.author: skates79

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Like the length. Takes a long time in the micro to get to a workable temp. Would have preferred that it come with a cover for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Rose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 'drugstore' heat wraps for my neck pain, and this neck wrap was FAR AND ABOVE anything else I've tried. It has a perfect weight to it, so it stays on your neck and doesn't fall off. It also heats up perfectly - no burn. The scent is barely noticeable (what I wanted), and I often wear it even without the heat as the perfect neck 'support'.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: ... pillow and can be adjusted to fit her neck better. Thanks for selling this product
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law just loves this as it is not your standard neck pillow and can be adjusted to fit her neck better. Thanks for selling this product. She was initially skeptical but warmed to it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shreimer

customer_reviews.title: Complicated hearing instructions!
customer_reviews.text: ***I don’t like to keep heating it at 10 second intervals after 1 minute of heat ....too time consuming. * Also not as long as I thought it would be. * Too heavy, not very pliable.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: The best! I tried others,,,
customer_reviews.text: Easy of use, soft n comfortable, best of all it did what I hoped it would it eased the pain! I tried others that were too much work and uncomfortable. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Faram

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic. It heats consistently and evenly
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. It heats consistently and evenly, and the warm moist heat is really effective. There isn't a strong aroma which is nice. It has been awesome at the end of a day, or even heating it up before the morning commute. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Walker

customer_reviews.title: Microwave Rice Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I could heat it in the microwave but it didn't relieve the pain as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly
customer_reviews.text: A few minutes in the microwave and the heat will last for awhile. I love this heating pad so much that I’m buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Derouen

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: Has a horrible odor. Could not use because it stunk so bad. Returned
customer_reviews.author: LaCosta

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This rice bag has been a life saver, I love how long it is and I am able to comfortably wrap it around the problem area.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: It gets nice and hot and is easy to wrap around your ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets nice and hot and is easy to wrap around your neck, arm etc. It feels a bit damp when heated which I don't love - may have missed that description before I ordered. Does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: jojomac

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a heat pack with beads sewn in place so you can have heat evenly distributed. Had a funky smell the first few uses but that got better. Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Muckle

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work, doesn’t explode.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t explode in the microwave like a gel pack and is comfortable. The stuffing tends to gravitate towards the ends, but you can just squish it to fit your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works perfect as a heat wrap for my neck and shoulder. Holds the heat well. I just wish it was about 4" longer.
customer_reviews.author: BHP940

customer_reviews.title: Offers heat relief for my neck and shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar product that burned in the microwave. I love that it warms up and provides instant relief for my neck and shoulders Personally, I am also going to look for a larger product that is just like this. This is perfect for the neck but I need one that is wider and longer to accommodate both neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee A. Ferry

customer_reviews.title: Love using this wrap to ease sore neck muscles.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is unscented. Ones that are scented make me nauseous.The size is just right around my neck and shoulders and lightweight. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Billy gumbo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, y use it very often for soreness, arthritis or just because it feels good!!
customer_reviews.author: epenao

customer_reviews.title: Relief from neck pain!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this heat wrap. My neck gets sore a lot, but when I put the wrap around my neck, it feels so good! It really gets the kinks out! I especially like to use it when I’m watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: The husband loves it. Retains the heat for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SKD

customer_reviews.title: Excellet product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three neck wraps and this is the best one ever! I bought the red and black check pattern and it is soft, extra long, and has no odor. It retains the heat and I am comfortable for hours. It relieves the pain in my shoulder almost instantly. The warmth provides a comfortable nights sleep,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mason

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy! The scent was not great either! The moisture was another thing I didn’t care for! I bought because I’m always cold & needing something for work & neck relief but it was a fail for me!
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Relief from neck pain
customer_reviews.text: Awesome neck relief, A must have, if you are wanting relief from neck pain. This is your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffory

customer_reviews.title: this really works
customer_reviews.text: for aching muscles, this product is easy to use and quite soothing
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Well Made With Plush Soft Fleece
customer_reviews.text: This is my second neck wrap that I’ve owned. This one is by far superior to my last. The first one I bought was made of flimsy cotton which ended up with a hole in the seam after so many uses. This one is made of thick, soft fleece. I can tell this one will last much longer. It’s that well made. Also, it’s hard to find products made in the USA. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: StPoe

customer_reviews.title: Works if you really need heat, but would not buy again. Way to heavy and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: It holds the heat for a respectable amount of time, but it is VERY heavy. I felt like I had 10lbs around my neck. Only use it when I REALLY need it
customer_reviews.author: Sue Beach

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not really long enough. Would rather not have 2 chambers and rather it be flatter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a great wrap (well made, soft, smells great) but the company went above and beyond to get it to me in the middle of the Covid quarantine. They actually went into their closed office to mail it to me - that's pretty incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best heated collar yet after using these for over 35 years
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. one detail that would be nice would be the possibility to connect it at the front so it stays in place
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Soft but doesn’t fit around the entire neck.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit all around the neck . You have to hold it with two hands. Very aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: BabsMI

customer_reviews.title: Wanted warmer l
customer_reviews.text: Love it Wish it stayed warmer longer but overall great
customer_reviews.author: Samantha & Jeremy

product_meta.title: Sunny Bay Unscented Neck Heating Wrap, Heat Therapy Pad for Sore Neck, Back & Shoulder Muscle Pain Relief-Thermal, Reusable, Non Electric Hot Pack Pads or Cold Compress Navy Blue, 2.5 Pound
product_meta.description: Color:Navy BluePAIN RELIEF Sunny Bay’s versatile heating pad pillow will quickly become your go-to solution for neck and shoulder muscle pain, soreness, and tension caused by intense training or accidental tweaks that can happen during daily activities. Simply pop it in the microwave or freezer for the best hot or cold therapy for your aching body. THERAPEUTIC Once your pillow is safely heated in the microwave, instantly place it on your neck for pain relief. Each pack holds in heat for 30 minute intervals, maximizing your relief for fast and efficient recovery. Stow your pad in your day bag or luggage for daily relief during travels near and far. COMFORTABLE Each pack is filled with fresh whole wheat fill to efficiently hold in heat and ensure a flexible fit around your target areas. Whether you’re standing up or moving around in your office chair, the pack stays put. Our anti-pill fleece cover retains warmth and is designed to protect your skin from the long-lasting heat stored inside. You’ll feel better in practically no time! HOT-COLD USE Forget gel packs or ice cubes melting through ragged towels. Our heat pillows handle hot and cold treatment with ease. Pop it in the microwave for quick heating, or place it in the refrigerator or freezer to chill for fast soothing. It’s perfect for muscle aches and pains from your neck and shoulders. REUSABLE No matter how many times you use it, our heat pack is ready for more. From the filling to the cover, we designed every detail to stand up to heavy, repeated use to provide you with consistent muscle pain relief on demand. -Sunny Bay Microwavable Neck Heating Pad -Relieves Muscle Tension and Pain -For Hot or Cold Muscle Therapy Soft Fleece Cover
feature_bullets: PAIN RELIEF: Sunny Bay’s versatile heating pad pillow will quickly become your go-to solution for neck and shoulder muscle pain, soreness, and tension caused by intense training or accidental tweaks that can happen during daily activities. Simply pop it in the microwave or freezer for the best hot or cold therapy for your aching body.

THERAPEUTIC: Once your pillow is safely heated in the microwave, instantly place it on your neck for pain relief. Each pack holds in heat for 30 minute intervals, maximizing your relief for fast and efficient recovery. Stow your pad in your day bag or luggage for daily relief during travels near and far.

COMFORTABLE: Each pack is filled with fresh whole wheat fill to efficiently hold in heat and ensure a flexible fit around your target areas. Whether you’re standing up or moving around in your office chair, the pack stays put. Our anti-pill fleece cover retains warmth and is designed to protect your skin from the long-lasting heat stored inside. You’ll feel better in practically no time!

HOT-COLD USE: Forget gel packs or ice cubes melting through ragged towels. Our heat pillows handle hot and cold treatment with ease. Pop it in the microwave for quick heating, or place it in the refrigerator or freezer to chill for fast soothing. It’s perfect for muscle aches and pains from your neck and shoulders.

REUSABLE: No matter how many times you use it, our heat pack is ready for more. From the filling to the cover, we designed every detail to stand up to heavy, repeated use to provide you with consistent muscle pain relief on demand.
